snippet: MacCRATE--Robert. The Board of Trustees and staff of Practising Law Institute (PLI) mourn the passing of longtime Trustee, Robert MacCrate. Robert was an active contributor to PLI and an ongoing supporter of continuing legal education. We will miss his wise counsel and wisdom. Our sympathies to his family at this time. William P. Frank, Board Chair Samuel W. Seymour, Executive Committee Chair Anita C. Shapiro, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: MacCRATE--Robert. The Board of Trustees and staff of Practising Law Institute (PLI) mourn the passing of longtime Trustee, Robert MacCrate. Robert was an active contributor to PLI and an ongoing supporter of continuing legal education. We will miss his wise counsel and wisdom. Our sympathies to his family at this time. William P. Frank, Board Chair Samuel W. Seymour, Executive Committee Chair Anita C. Shapiro, President 1/3
